amendment.description: To make improvements in the MedicareAdvantage benchmark determinations.

action.text: Amendment SA 961, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 961 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 961 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S8538; text: CR S8538) To make improvements in the MedicareAdvantage benchmark determinations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 961 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 961 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Murray.
